citation.article-title: Iamia majanohamensis gen. nov., sp. nov., an actinobacterium isolated from sea cucumber Holothuria edulis, and proposal of Iamiaceae fam. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Iamiaceae (I.a.mi.a′ce.ae. N.L. fem. n. Iamia type genus of the family; -aceae ending to denote a family; N.L. fem. n. Iamiaceae the family of Iamia).
Segregation of these organisms into a novel family is justified by their distinct phyletic lineage based on the 16S rRNA gene.
The pattern of 16S rRNA gene sequence signature nucleotides of members of the family consists of 408–434 (G–C), 722–733 (G–G), 1118–1155 (U–A), 443–491 (U–A), 1165–1171 (G–C) and 1263–1272 (A–U).
